short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the boost characters limit and boooost like never before!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Loving boost in Basecamp, but hate having only 16 characters to do it with? Then Booster+ is for you. With this simple tool, you can change the boost character limit and boooost like never before.

Star the project on GitHub
https://github.com/alefranzoni/basecamp-booster-plus/
